errors.name: CallerNotTheNewOwner
errors.description: The caller is not the new owner.

errors.name: CallerNotTheOwner
errors.description: The caller is not the owner.

errors.name: RoleRenounceForAnotherAddress
errors.description: The role cannot be renounced for another address.

entry_points.name: transfer_ownership
entry_points.description: Transfers the ownership of the contract to a new owner.

entry_points.name: owner
entry_points.description: Returns the owner of the contract.

entry_points.name: push_on_stack
entry_points.description: Pushes a value on the stack.

entry_points.name: pop_from_stack
entry_points.description: Pops a value from the stack.

entry_points.name: get_stack_len
entry_points.description: Returns the length of the stack.

entry_points.name: immutable_cross_call
entry_points.description: Returns the total supply of the ERC20 contract. This is an example of an immutable cross-contract call.

entry_points.name: mutable_cross_call
entry_points.description: Transfers 1 token from the ERC20 contract to the caller. This is an example of a mutable cross-contract call.

arguments.name: odra_cfg_package_hash_key_name
arguments.description: The arg name for the package hash key name.

arguments.name: odra_cfg_allow_key_override
arguments.description: The arg name for the allow key override.

arguments.name: odra_cfg_is_upgradable
arguments.description: The arg name for the contract upgradeability setting.
